# Shadow Anchor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Shadow Spells|shadow]]) \[[[Shadow Spells|shadow]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Effect:** A shadowy shadow tether

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D); see text

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 211

The target’s shadow becomes a flexible tether to its current square. The creature can move up to 5 feet from that square without penalty. Moving farther than 5 feet from the tether point requires the target to make a [[Bull Rush|bull rush]] combat maneuver check against a CMB of 10 + 1/2 your caster level + your Intelligence modifier (if a [[Witch|witch]] or [[Wizard|wizard]]) or Charisma modifier (if a [[Bard|bard]] or [[Sorcerer|sorcerer]]). The target takes a –1 penalty for every 5 feet of distance between it and its tethered square. Failing this check means the target’s move is wasted and it cannot move farther away. If it fails this check by 10 or more, it is pulled 5 feet toward the tether square and is knocked [[Prone|prone]]. If it beats the check by 10 or more, the spell ends. This spell does not work on creatures that do not cast [[Shadow (Bestiary PF1)|shadows]] or reflections. If the target uses a [[Teleportation Spells|teleportation]] effect or leaves the current plane, the spell ends.
